short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Load web pages at 100% zoom level for better experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Load web pages at 100% zoom level for a particular domain. For users of the domain, application would be loaded at 100% zoom level resulting in better customer experience.
